meanings.definition: A woman engaged in commercial or industrial business.
meanings.sent1: The businesswomen in the office were discussing their latest project.
meanings.sent2: Many businesswomen attend networking events to grow their businesses.
meanings.sent3: The businesswomen decided to start a lemonade stand for fun.
meanings.sent4: She was a businesswoman in the boardroom, making strategic decisions.
meanings.sent5: The group of businesswomen stood out in their professional attire.

meanings.definition: Women collectively engaged in commercial or industrial business.
meanings.sent1: The community was proud of the successful businesswomen in town.
meanings.sent2: Businesswomen from different industries came together for a conference.
meanings.sent3: The businesswomen organized a bake sale to raise funds for charity.
meanings.sent4: The city thrived with the contributions of hardworking businesswomen.
meanings.sent5: The group of businesswomen collaborated on a project to benefit the community.
